Name: Poker Show VR
About the game: Notice: Requires a Virtual Reality headset and a Gamepad! Poker Show VR is an entertaining VR poker game featuring classic five card draw poker meets real-life fashion models as opponents, who tastefully remove clothing when they lose. The game focuses on real-life experience, and features a dynamic mix of pre-shot panoramic videos of beautiful models and interactive content. Poker Show VR is the first poker game which gives you the illusion of reality. Key Features: Classic five card draw poker game 3 real-life fashion models as opponents Achievement system – 18 achievements Leaderboards Social Experience – selfies and text messages from opponents after you beat them
Meta Title: Poker Show VR: May 30, 2017, Kogei and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Poker Show VR? Check out the release date (May 30, 2017), developer insights from Kogei, and a complete game summary.
